form.name: Your name:
form.submitted: Thank you for reaching out, I will get back to you shortly!

Summary.title: Profile Summary
Summary.summary1: Proficient in both modern and less-modern technologies, with <highlight>over {{experienceYears}} years of experience</highlight> in web development. Skilled in development, testing, DevOps and automation - a great fit for many roles.
Summary.summary2: Creative and detail-oriented, constantly working towards functional solutions without compromising on design and aesthetics. Always seeking to add the <highlight>extra touch</highlight> to give a novel experience that turns heads and amazes.
Summary.summary3: Well-versed in both <highlight>individual and team settings</highlight>, eager to independently research problems, write thorough documentation, and cooperate with colleagues to deliver a delightful product.
